Our Customer Trust & Policies

Welcome to quantumcybervision.com. Our entire business is built on a single idea: trust. We believe you deserve powerful tools, fair prices, and honest policies. We are not "The Other Guys." Here is our simple, unbreakable commitment to you.

1. Pricing & Billing Policies

  • The "Price Lock" GuaranteeThe price you sign up for (monthly or annual) is locked in for the life of your subscription. We will never raise your rates. Our prices won't change on you.
  • All-Inclusive, "No-Surprise" PricingThe price you see is the only price you pay. We do not have hidden, extra monthly fees for real-time market data from major exchanges. All data costs are built directly into your plan price.
  • The 7-Day "Grace Period"We understand that not everyone gets paid on the same day. If a payment ever fails, your account is not instantly shut off. Your access continues uninterrupted for a 7-day grace period, and we'll send you a simple, no-hassle email to update your billing info.
  • Fair Global Pricing (PPP)We believe everyone deserves access to powerful tools. We use Purchasing Power Parity (PPP) to automatically adjust our prices to be fair and affordable for your country's local economy.
  • Secure & Honest BillingWe use a world-leading, PCI-compliant payment processor (Stripe) to handle all subscriptions. This guarantees your data is secure and you will never be double-billed or charged for services you haven't authorized.

2. Service & Feature Policies

  • The "Feature-Lock" GuaranteeThis is our "No Bait-and-Switch" promise. When you buy a plan, you are guaranteed to keep all the features of that plan for as long as you are subscribed. We will never remove features from paying customers to force an upgrade.
  • 1-Click "No-Hassle" CancellationYou are in complete control. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings with a single click. You will never be forced into a "retention loop" or have to argue with a chatbot to stop your payments.
  • A Free Plan That's Actually UsefulOur Free plan is our best advertisement. It is powerful, genuinely useful, and 100% Ad-Free, forever. We believe you should upgrade because you want more power, not because the free plan is broken.
  • Free Billing Support for EveryoneYou should never have to pay to ask a question. Our billing and sales support is free for everyone. You do not need to be a paid member to get help with a payment or account question.
  • Proactive Security & Fraud ProtectionWe will never ask for your password, private keys, or cryptocurrency. All official communication will always come from an @quantumcybervision.com email address. Any "free premium" offers you see on social media are scams.
